text:
My OS is Redhat Linux 7.2
java -version
java version "1.4.2_04"
Java(TM) 2 Runtime Environment, Standard Edition (build 1.4.2_04-b05)
Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM (build 1.4.2_04-b05, mixed mode)

My classpath :

CLASSPATH=/usr/share/pgsql/rh-postgresql3.jar:
/users/tomcat/jakarta-tomcat-5.0.28/common/lib/servlet-api.jar:
/users/hads/lib/classes:/users/tomcat/jakarta-tomcat-5.0.28/webapps/nexhads/WEB-INF/classes:
/usr/local/src/XML/xalan-j_2_6_0/bin/xalan.jar:

/users/apache/htdocs/hads/JFreeChart/jfreechart/jfreechart-0.9.20.jar:
/users/apache/htdocs/hads/JFreeChart/jfreechart/jcommon-0.9.5.jar:
/usr/local/lib/mail.jar:/usr/local/lib/activation.jar:.

I try to test the sample for XALAN 2.6.0, extensions JavaScript

java org.apache.xalan.xslt.Process -in 2-basicJscript.xml -xsl 2-basicJscript.xsl

I got error about java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException

file:///usr/local/src/XML/xalan-j_2_6_0/samples/extensions/2-basicJscript.xsl;
Line #33; Column #42; XSLT Error (javax.xml.transform.TransformerException):
java.lang.NullPointerException

text:
I resolved this by down grade the js.jar from 1.6R1 to 1.5R5, then down to 1.5R2
So Xalan 2.6.0 works for js.jar 1.5R2 only.
